ul.li: A catalogue of pictures, composed and painted chiefly by the most admired masters of the Roman, Florentine, Parman, Bolognese, Venetian, Flemish, and French schools : in which many of the most capital are illustrated by descriptions and critical remarks : humbly offered to the impartial examination of the public / by Robert Foulis.

A catalogue of pictures, composed and painted chiefly by the most admired masters of the Roman, Florentine, Parman, Bolognese, Venetian, Flemish, and French schools [microform] : In which many of the most capital are illustrated by descriptions, and critical remarks / humbly offered to the impartial examination of the public by Robert Foulis.
